title: Did George Soros push the refugees in Honduras to join the Caravan and the American Border Storm?
subtitle: In October 2018, the United States Congressman published an unfounded, scary and factually inaccurate tweet alleging that George Soros had paid a group of refugees in Honduras to break into the border.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A video shows a group of people in Honduras who are being paid by George Soros to join the immigrant convoy and break into the United States border.
